title: Cristian Noriega
text:
Cristian Jafeth Noriega Santizo (born 20 March 1987) is a <a href="Guatemala">Guatemala</a>n professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> defender.
Club career.
Noriega came through the youth ranks at <a href="CSD%20Municipal">Municipal</a> to make his debut in 2007.
International career.
Noriega made his debut for the senior <a href="Guatemala%20national%20football%20team">Guatemala national football team</a> in a February 2008 friendly match against <a href="Argentina%20national%20football%20team">Argentina</a>, but the game was not official by <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a>, so, his first official one came against <a href="Panama%20national%20football%20team">Panama</a> in a June 2008 friendly. He has made 14 appearances at the start of January 2010, including 3 qualifying matches for the <a href="2010%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2010 FIFA World Cup</a>.
